CUST002.summary: Arjun purchased a Graphic Print Urban Tee with a ₹200 discount paid via UPI. He now wants to return the T‑shirts from his most recent order (ORD001). The order is currently out for delivery, so a return cannot be started yet. The bot offered two options: (1) refuse the package when the courier arrives, or (2) accept the delivery and then arrange a free pickup (or drop‑off) for the return. Arjun has not yet indicated which option he prefers.

CUST001.summary: Riya returned to the kiosk, selected Premium Leather Heels and added them to her cart. To qualify for a ₹500 discount on orders over ₹5,000, she also added Wide‑Leg Palazzo Pants. After confirming the cart total, she proceeded to payment and completed the purchase with a card. The system provided a receipt (INV-1765915124) showing a final amount of ₹5,398. Riya then asked about Nexora's return policy, which the bot explained in detail.
CUST001.last_purchased: Premium Leather Heels, Wide-Leg Palazzo Pants
